channel.title: "Ellen(McLain) is going in Tuesday for a new game and more Portal work"
channel.description:
That's what John Lowrie (her husband) said on [url='https://twitter.com/#!/johnpatricklowr/status/98284898976145409']Twitter[/url].
I wonder what new game she's working on. Could be Dota 2 but there's that tournament going on so I suppose the voices are done by now.

wait. . .

item.title: "Ellen(McLain) is going in Tuesday for a new game and more Portal work"
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Shnazliztur:

II don’t know what role she would play in episode 3 since the combine SHOULD be cut off from the overworld & I’m sure dragging around their propaganda speakers would just slow the combine down, I mean that is what I would think they would do.

In Episode 2, you can hear the voice quite clearly in the shack where you see Eli & Dr. Magnusson on the monitor.

item.title: "Ellen(McLain) is going in Tuesday for a new game and more Portal work"
item.dc:creator: Sgt_smiles
item.description:
Gabe: Do they suspect anything? do they think it’s just for voice acting?

Ellen: Don’t worry, even the internet is clueless to our forbidden love

Gabe: you know what would happen if they found out right?

Ellen: I don’t care! I won’t live in a world where a man and a women can love each-other, but I’m not allowed to be with a land walrus.

Gabe: One day they will understand… one day we can love as equals

Read full topic

item.title: "Ellen(McLain) is going in Tuesday for a new game and more Portal work"
item.dc:creator: Shnazliztur
item.description:
I do remember hearing her voice as the background lady that alerted the combine whenever Gordon trips any sensors or gets ambushed by them. If you didn’t get that she usually said “Priority Warning! Intrusion in sector…” & in the citadel when all the weapons get zapped & the gravity gun gets an overcharge turning blue. I don’t know what role she would play in episode 3 since the combine SHOULD be cut off from the overworld & I’m sure dragging around their propaganda speakers would just slow the combine down, I mean that is what I would think they would do. She might be doing some last minute voice work in DoTA2 since lip syncing is usually less tedious work compared to the other stages of development cycles for the most part.
^(The only exception to that would be for anything Bethesda releases on that horrible Gamebryo engine…the one Fallout 3 & Vegas uses[correct me if I got the name wrong], it’s soo unreliable & the emotionless character faces bug the hell out of me. I bet the thought of ladders makes them scared since it can’t even handle that without jumping through loading screens)

Read full topic
item.source: "Ellen(McLain) is going in Tuesday for a new game and more Portal work"
